context: Notification system - email templates were seeded to wrong Firestore project (frodie01 instead of wanapi-prod)
content: Python firebase_admin SDK uses gcloud default project, NOT firebase CLI project. When seeding Firestore, always set GOOGLE_CLOUD_PROJECT env var or run gcloud config set project wanapi-prod first.

context: Pricing strategy review - discovered WaveSpeed cost structure mismatch
content: Extender pricing was losing money (-567% margin). WaveSpeed charges per OUTPUT second, not per base video length. Fixed formula: 480p=5 credits, 720p=10 credits (fixed, not % of base). See docs/tasks/EXTENDER_PRICING_FIX.md
